casebody.data:
David A. JEFFRIES
v.
Darryl G. SMITH, Attorney at Law. No. 314P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2006. David A. Jeffries, Pro Se. Darryl G. Smith, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 14th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wilson County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in Conference this the 16th day of June 2006."
